name: TOTEM (itch) (Mellow)
description:
You are the last remaining ROOT, your connection to LONG DEAD ANIMALS gives you STRENGTH, you must find the LAST SEED in the FORSAKEN TEMPLE and rejuvenate the WORLD.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys/HJKL - Movement
  • Spacebar - Interact/Pickup
  • Left click - Attack/Equip
  • Right click - Drop

The FORSAKEN TEMPLE has 8 levels, on the final floor is the BROODMOTHER, defeat her to retrieve the LAST SEED.

Good luck, Root.
